regen.absent_element: mechanism for setting or adjusting configurable alert thresholds
regen.new_specification: The system shall allow administrators to set and adjust alert thresholds for monitored resources.

regen.absent_element: mechanism for triggering alerts when thresholds are exceeded
regen.new_specification: The system shall generate and send alerts when monitored resources exceed configured threshold levels

regen.absent_element: situation of triggering alerts when thresholds are exceeded
regen.new_specification: The system shall trigger an alert and send a notification to the designated recipients when a monitored resource exceeds its configured threshold
